net.trajano.auth

Class HttpHeaderAuthModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.auth.HttpHeaderAuthModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.security.auth.message.module.ServerAuthModule, javax.security.auth.message.ServerAuth

    public class HttpHeaderAuthModule
extends Object
implements javax.security.auth.message.module.ServerAuthModule
    HTTP header server auth module. This can be used with SiteMinder type data.
    Author:
    Archimedes Trajano

      • SUPPORTED_MESSAGE_TYPES

        private static final Class<?>[] SUPPORTED_MESSAGE_TYPES
        Supported message types. For our case we only need to deal with HTTP servlet request and responses. On Java EE 7 this will handle WebSockets as well.

      • getSupportedMessageTypes

        public Class[] getSupportedMessageTypes()

        The array it returns contains immutable data so it is secure and faster to return the internal array.

        Specified by:

      • groups

        private String[] groups(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
        Builds a list of groups from the request. If not defined, then "users" is returned.
        Parameters:
        req - servlet request.
        Returns:
        array of groups.
